poem:
Title: Fragments of a Breaking Dawn

Morning stirs, news whispers urgent tales,
Sanctions sought, Gaza weeps, justice scales.
Prime minister's voice, heavy with dismay,
X - the old Twitter - dare to disobey.
Meanwhile, hope competes with sombre tune,
Swift wings of change dance with the moon.
Underwritten by the commonwealth's might,
Evokes dawn with renewable light.
